== List of the selected fields from TCGA data ==

==== <span style="color:#32 CD 32"> DNA Methylation Result </span> ====

chromosome, position, beta_value


==== Expression Exon Result ====

chromosome, start, stop, RPKM


==== Expression Protein Result ====

chromosome, start, stop, protein_expression_value



==== Expression Gene Result ====

chromosome, start, stop, scaled_estimate



==== Copy Number Result ====

chromosome, start, stop, seg_mean



==== SNP Result ====

chromosome, start, stop, seg_mean



==== miRNA Result ====

chromosome, start, stop, reads_per_million_miRNA_mapped


==== Clinical, Lookup Files ====

complete fields
